alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Fort Bend and west central Harris Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 527 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Addicks Park Ten, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jersey Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Spring Branch West, Addicks Park Ten, Mission Bend, Spring Branch North, Eldridge / West Oaks, Spring Valley, Hedwig Village, Spring Branch Central, Westchase, Sharpstown, Cinco Ranch, Westbranch, Briar Forest, Fairbanks / Northwest Crossing, Carverdale, Mid West and Alief. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
